snippet.title: Ironhive - Official Demo Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch the latest trailer for Ironhive to see gameplay and learn more about the dark story of this deckbuilding strategy game about surviving in a dying world. Ironhive will be available on PC, and a demo is available now on Steam. 

In Ironhive, build your colony, ensure the survival of your people, create a legacy that will be passed on to the next generations. As the Ironlord, you are their only remaining hope.
